# sendoracity_city (Resource)

City resource

``` hcl
resource "sendoracity_city" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  touristic = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) City name
- `touristic` (Boolean) Whether the city is touristic or not

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) City identifier
